pageProduct.name: Remescar Instant Facelift & V-Shape 5 Ampoules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Redefine your face contours together with Remescar.

As we age, the shape of our face changes and our skin becomes thinner and less elastic. Our jawline may become less defined and the lower skinpart of the face loses its firmness and tightness. We can describe it as a loss of facial contours.

Common Uses

Remescar Instant Facelift V-shape aims to repair and regenerate the skin and wants to lift sagging skin immediately. The sculpted effect (V-shape) brings back your jawline from years ago. Because of the advanced technology that has been used, the active ingredients will penetrate the skin up to 10 000 x more than other topical products.

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Methylpropanediol, Hydrolyzed Sponge Extract, Dimethylaminoethanol Tartrate, Caffeine, Maltodextrin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Triethanolamine, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum, PVP, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium EDTA, Phenylpropanol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Ceramide NP, Lecithin, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil, Phytosterols, Squalane, DMDM Hydantoin, Bacillus Ferment, Phenoxyethanol, Silanetriol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, CI 42090

Directions

1. Shake well before use; small particles should be uniformly dispersed for best results.
2. Cover the ampoule neck with the enclosed ampoule opener.
3. Hold the ampoule by the opener and break it open with a sharp movement on the lower, colored ring.
4. Add the dropper cap and remove the cover of the cap. Pour the concentrate into the palm of your hand.
5. Gently pat to the jawline with outward and upward movements and then spread remainder over entire face, neck and décolleté.
